mapper.insert: insert into mask_order ( orderNum, addressee, tel, address, payPrice, productCnt, productName, payMeans, userID, state) values ( orderNum_seq.nextval, #{addressee}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{payPrice}, #{productCnt}, #{productName}, #{payMeans}, #{userID}, #{state})
mapper.select: select * from mask_order order by orderDate desc

select m.userid, m.tel, m.userName, m.email, m.address, w.wishlistNum, w.productNum, w.productcnt, p.productPrice, p.productname, p.productImage from member m,wishlist w,product p where m.userid=w.userid and w.productNum=p.productNum

select o.orderNum, o.addressee, o.address, o.tel, o.payPrice, o.productCnt, o.productName, o.payMeans, o.orderDate, o.userID, o.state, w.productNum, p.productPrice, p.productImage from mask_order o,wishlist w,product p where o.userid=w.userid and w.productNum=p.productNum and o.orderNum=#{orderNum}
mapper.update: update mask_order set state=#{state} where orderNum=#{orderNum}
